Chris there must be some other magic here...can you generally reproduce?
I have not been able to.

Darin, I repeated the procedure a few times before submitting to make sure. It
happens every time. However, I now also notice that I have a strangeness in my
workbench. There are three Java perspective buttons on the ruler. Maybe one of
them is defunct, but is still registered as a listener. I'll rebuild my
workspace and try it again. Thanks for the feedback. -Chris

It would appear that you have a JDISourceViewer that is not fully disposed.
The code looks safe for the error you are seeing.

I repeated the experiment in a clean workspace, which correctly showed only Java
Perspective button. The bug was not observed. Marking as INVALID. I will try and
repeat the non-disposed button issue and submit that separately to JDT-UI. Thanks.
For the record, I think this is a dup of Bug 51783 or Bug 51000.
